translations: n．亡命之徒，极端罪犯：指那些不顾一切、极端危险的罪犯或亡命之徒。
· The town was terrorized by a gang of desperadoes.
这个小镇被一伙亡命之徒恐吓。

sentences.sentence: The desperadoes of Sortu have done little to earn this.
sentences.translation: 至少对于索图的那些亡命之徒更是如此。

sentences.sentence: There is a traditional last resort, used, among others, by Japanese banks in California in the 1980s and more recently by desperadoes in eastern Europe.
sentences.translation: 有一个传统的最终手段，20世纪80年代时由加利福尼亚的日本银行开始使用，最近则被东欧的亡命之徒在利用。

sentences.sentence: Desperadoes Hong Jing (decorated Zhang Jiahui) received its orders to the capture of the Ding Ling, Tang Fei to happen to be hit, but not in time to save Ding Ling.
sentences.translation: 亡命之徒洪荆(张家辉饰)接其命令往活捉丁玲，碰巧给唐飞撞上，却未能及时把丁玲救回。
